stages.name: Verse 8
stages.arabic: وَمِنَ النَّاسِ مَن يَقُولُ آمَنَّا بِاللَّهِ وَبِالْيَوْمِ الْآخِرِ وَمَا هُم بِمُؤْمِنِينَ
stages.english: And of the people are some who say, 'We believe in Allah and the Last Day,' but they are not believers
stages.transliteration: Wa minan-nasi man yaqoolu aamanna billahi wa bil-yawmil-aakhiri wa ma hum bi-mu'mineen
stages.instruction: Learn about those who claim faith falsely

stages.name: Verse 9
stages.arabic: يُخَادِعُونَ اللَّهَ وَالَّذِينَ آمَنُوا وَمَا يَخْدَعُونَ إِلَّا أَنفُسَهُمْ وَمَا يَشْعُرُونَ
stages.english: They [think to] deceive Allah and those who believe, but they deceive not except themselves and perceive [it] not
stages.transliteration: Yukhaadi'oonal-laha wallatheena aamanoo wa ma yakhda'oona illa anfusahum wa ma yash'uroon

stages.name: Verse 10
stages.arabic: فِي قُلُوبِهِم مَّرَضٌ فَزَادَهُمُ اللَّهُ مَرَضًا ۖ وَلَهُمْ عَذَابٌ أَلِيمٌ بِمَا كَانُوا يَكْذِبُونَ
stages.english: In their hearts is disease, so Allah has increased their disease; and for them is a painful punishment because they [habitually] used to lie
stages.transliteration: Fee quloobihim maradun fazaadahumul-laahu maradaa; wa lahum 'athaabun aleemun bima kaanoo yakziboon
stages.instruction: Learn about the consequence of spiritual disease

stages.name: Verse 11
stages.arabic: وَإِذَا قِيلَ لَهُمْ لَا تُفْسِدُوا فِي الْأَرْضِ قَالُوا إِنَّمَا نَحْنُ مُصْلِحُونَ
stages.english: And when it is said to them, 'Do not cause corruption on the earth,' they say, 'We are but reformers'
stages.transliteration: Wa itha qeela lahum la tufsidoo fil-ardi qaloo innama nahnu muslihoon
stages.instruction: Understand how corruption is justified by its perpetrators

stages.name: Verse 12
stages.arabic: أَلَا إِنَّهُمْ هُمُ الْمُفْسِدُونَ وَلَٰكِن لَّا يَشْعُرُونَ
stages.english: Unquestionably, it is they who are the corrupters, but they perceive [it] not
stages.transliteration: Alaa innahum humul-mufsidoona wa laakin laa yash'uroon

stages.name: Verse 13
stages.arabic: وَإِذَا قِيلَ لَهُمْ آمِنُوا كَمَا آمَنَ النَّاسُ قَالُوا أَنُؤْمِنُ كَمَا آمَنَ السُّفَهَاءُ ۗ أَلَا إِنَّهُمْ هُمُ السُّفَهَاءُ وَلَٰكِن لَّا يَعْلَمُونَ
stages.english: And when it is said to them, 'Believe as the people have believed,' they say, 'Should we believe as the foolish have believed?' Unquestionably, it is they who are the foolish, but they know [it] not
stages.transliteration: Wa itha qeela lahum aaminoo kamaa aaman naasu qaaloo anu'minu kamaa aamanas-sufahaaa'; alaa innahum humus-sufahaaa'u wa laakil laa ya'lamoon

stages.name: Verse 14
stages.arabic: وَإِذَا لَقُوا الَّذِينَ آمَنُوا قَالُوا آمَنَّا وَإِذَا خَلَوْا إِلَىٰ شَيَاطِينِهِمْ قَالُوا إِنَّا مَعَكُمْ إِنَّمَا نَحْنُ مُسْتَهْزِئُونَ
stages.english: And when they meet those who believe, they say, 'We believe'; but when they are alone with their evil ones, they say, 'Indeed, we are with you; we were only mocking'
stages.transliteration: Wa itha laqul-latheena aamanoo qaalooo aamannaa wa itha khalaw ilaa shayaateenihim qaalooo innaa ma'akum innamaa nahnu mustahzi'oon
stages.instruction: Learn about the two-faced nature of hypocrites

stages.name: Verse 15
stages.arabic: اللَّهُ يَسْتَهْزِئُ بِهِمْ وَيَمُدُّهُمْ فِي طُغْيَانِهِمْ يَعْمَهُونَ
stages.english: Allah mocks them and prolongs them in their transgression [while] they wander blindly
stages.transliteration: Allahu yastahzi'u bihim wa yamudduhum fee tughyaanihim ya'mahoon

stages.name: Verse 16
stages.arabic: أُولَٰئِكَ الَّذِينَ اشْتَرَوُا الضَّلَالَةَ بِالْهُدَىٰ فَمَا رَبِحَت تِّجَارَتُهُمْ وَمَا كَانُوا مُهْتَدِينَ
stages.english: Those are the ones who have purchased error [in exchange] for guidance, so their transaction has brought no profit, nor were they guided
stages.transliteration: Ulaaa'ikal latheenash-tarawud-dalaalata bilhudaa famaa rabihat tijaaratuhum wa maa kaanoo muhtadeen
stages.instruction: Learn about the spiritual loss of choosing misguidance
